trans-unit.source: Represents a set of access rights to be audited for a user or group.
trans-unit.target: 表示要为用户或组审核的一组访问权限。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on named system events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule>类是一套.NET Framework 提供了用于管理已命名的系统事件的 Windows 访问控制安全性的类之一。

trans-unit.source: For an overview of these classes and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>.
trans-unit.target: 有关这些类和二者关系的基础 Windows 访问控制结构的概述，请参阅<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>。

trans-unit.source: Windows access control security is meaningful only for named system events.
trans-unit.target: Windows 访问控制安全，则仅对的已命名的系统事件有意义。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle> object represents a local event, access control is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle>对象表示本地事件，则访问控制不起作用。

trans-unit.source: To get a list of the audit rules currently applied to a named event, use the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get an <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> object, and then use its <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAuditRules%2A> method to obtain a collection of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> objects.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取当前应用于命名的事件的审核规则的列表，请使用<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以获取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>对象，，然后使用其<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.CommonObjectSecurity.GetAuditRules%2A>方法来获取的集合<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary access control list (DACL).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> 对象不映射一对一与基础的自由访问控制列表 (DACL) 中的访问控制项。

trans-unit.source: When you get the set of all audit rules for an event, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries.
trans-unit.target: 当您获取组的所有审核事件的规则，该集合包含的最小当前表示所有访问控制项所需要的规则数。

trans-unit.source: The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules.
trans-unit.target: 基础的访问控制项更改，因为将应用并删除规则。

trans-unit.source: The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，合并规则中的信息来维护最少数量的访问控制项。

trans-unit.source: Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当读取的规则的当前列表，它可能不完全一样已添加的所有规则的列表。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> objects to specify access rights to be audited for a user or group.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule>对象来指定审核的用户或组的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: To apply a rule to a named system event, use the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to get the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要将规则应用于已命名的系统事件，请使用<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以获取<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>对象。

trans-unit.source: Modify the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to reattach the security object.
trans-unit.target: 修改<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>对象通过使用其方法来添加规则，然后使用<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法重新附加安全对象。

trans-unit.source: Changes you make to an <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> object do not affect the access levels of the named event until you call the <xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to assign the altered security object to the named event.
trans-unit.target: 对所做的更改<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>对象不会影响已命名的事件，直到你调用的访问级别<xref:System.Threading.EventWaitHandle.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法以将修改过的安全对象分配给已命名的事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> objects are immutable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> 对象是不可变。

trans-unit.source: Security for an event is modified using the methods of the <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity> class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified.
trans-unit.target: 使用的方法修改事件的安全性<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleSecurity>类来添加或删除规则; 执行此操作时，修改的基础的访问控制项。

trans-unit.source: Security on synchronization objects is not supported for Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.
trans-unit.target: Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支持同步对象的安全性。

trans-unit.source: The user or group the rule applies to.
trans-unit.target: 此规则应用到的用户或组。

trans-unit.source: Must be of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> or a type such as <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount" /> that can be converted to type <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: 必须为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> 类型，或可以转换为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount" /> 类型的类型，如 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleRights" /> values specifying the kinds of access to audit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleRights" /> 值的按位组合，它指定要审核的访问类型。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> values specifying whether to audit success, failure, or both.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags" /> 值的按位组合，它指定审核是成功、失败还是包括这两种情况。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule" /> class, specifying the user or group to audit, the rights to audit, and whether to audit success, failure, or both.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule" /> 类的新实例，指定要审核的用户或组，要审核的权限，以及是否审核成功和（或）失败。

trans-unit.source: To create an <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount> object from a string representing a user or group name, use the <xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount>从表示用户或组名称的字符串对象，请使用<xref:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount.%23ctor%28System.String%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="eventRights" /> specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="eventRights" /> 指定了一个无效值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="flags" /> specifies an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="flags" /> 指定了一个无效值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="identity" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="eventRights" /> is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="eventRights" /> 为零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="identity" /> is neither of type <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> nor of a type such as <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount" /> that can be converted to type <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="identity" /> 既不属于类型 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />，也不属于可以转换为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.NTAccount" /> 类型的类型（如 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access rights affected by the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 获取受此审核规则影响的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleRights" /> values that indicates the rights affected by the audit rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleRights" /> 值的按位组合，它指示受此审核规则影响的权限。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> objects are immutable.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.EventWaitHandleAuditRule> 对象是不可变。

trans-unit.source: You can create a new audit rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different combination of <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags> flags, but you cannot modify an existing audit rule.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建新的审核规则，以表示不同的用户、 不同的权限或不同的组合<xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AuditFlags>标志，但你无法修改现有的审核规则。
